Description: Limestone ostracon with 11 lines of text on one side containing a letter.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Monastery of St Phoibammon, Location of the Temmple of Mentuhotep I.
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (192-95, pl.21)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82885) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82885)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 19 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
